challenge.title: Forks Over Knives - The Plant Based Way to Health E-Reserve
challenge.description: Forks Over Knives: The Plant Based Way to Health (2011) is a companion text to the film and a compelling argument for choosing a whole-food, plant based diet.
challenge.instructions: Read Forks Over Knives's The Plant Based Way to Health on E-Reserve at Archive.org (requires an Archive.org account)
